icon.description: The icon name on the left only supports uView's built-in icons, see Icon icon
icon.description_zh: 左侧图标名，只支持uView内置图标，见Icon 图标

border-bottom.description: Whether to display the lower border of the cell

border-top.description: Whether to display the upper border of the cell

border-gap.description: When border-bottom is true, whether the bottom border of the middle entry in the cell list is separated from the left 1.4.0 is deprecated
border-gap.description_zh: border-bottom为true时，Cell列表中间的条目的下边框是否与左边有一个间隔 1.4.0已废弃

hover-class.description: Whether to enable click feedback, none is ineffective, see the instructions above
hover-class.description_zh: 是否开启点击反馈，none为无效果，见上方说明

arrow.description: Whether to display the right arrow, if you turn it on, it will bring click feedback by default, which can be configured through hover-class
arrow.description_zh: 是否显示右侧箭头，开启的话，将会默认带上点击反馈，可通过hover-class配置

required.description: Whether or not to display the asterisk on the left indicates that it is mandatory
required.description_zh: 是否显示左边表示必填的星号

value-style.description_zh: 右侧内容样式，对象形式

label-style.description: The style of the information described below the heading, in the form of an object
label-style.description_zh: 标题下方描述信息的样式，对象形式

bg-color.description_zh: 背景颜色，默认透明背景

index.description: It is used to return in the click event callback to identify the current number of items
index.description_zh: 用于在click事件回调中返回，标识当前是第几个Item

title-width.description: The width of the title, in rpx

icon-size.description: The size of the icon passed in by the icon parameter on the left, in rpx
icon-size.description_zh: 左边通过icon参数传入的图标的大小，单位rpx

center.description: Whether to center the content vertically

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when you click on the cell list

slots.name: title
slots.description: If you want to customize the content of the title part on the left, do not define the title parameter or assign null values
slots.description_zh: 自定义左侧标题部分的内容，如需使用，请勿定义title参数，或赋值null即可

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Customize the icon on the left

slots.name: right-icon
slots.description: To customize the content of the icon on the right, you need to set arrow to false for it to work
slots.description_zh: 自定义右侧图标内容，需设置arrow为false才起作用

slots.name: label
slots.description: To customize the label content, you must also set use-label-slot to true
slots.description_zh: 自定义label内容，需同时设置use-label-slot为true
